article.title: Northrop Grumman Selected by Air Force for Next Generation Missile Warning System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has been awarded a contract to deliver Next Generation Missile Warning Systems (NexGen MWS) as the latest upgrade to their Large Aircraft Infrared Countermeasures (LAIRCM) system, which protects aircrews and high-value aircraft from shoulder-fired heat-seeking missiles.
